ModMetaData.name: Passable (and Hefty) Vanilla Chemfuel Expanded Buildings
ModMetaData.author: large moron
ModMetaData.description:
Deepchem/Chemfuel storage tanks and Refineries are now passable so you can build under and behind them. They also store 5000, up from 1500, and the extract gizmo removes 500, up from 150.
That's it. That's the patch.
